remarks: The value of the step function ` E ` for Euclid's Algorithm on an ordered pair.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
statement:
eucalgval.1 $e |- E = ( x e. NN0 , y e. NN0 |-> if ( y = 0 , <. x , y >. , <. y , ( x mod y ) >. ) ) $.
eucalgval2 $p |- ( ( M e. NN0 /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( M E N ) = if ( N = 0 , <. M , N >. , <. N , ( M mod N ) >. ) ) $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
